title: Inductive Clustering with Scikit-Learn
description: In this lab, we will learn about inductive clustering, a method that extends clustering by inducing a classifier from the cluster labels. We will use scikit-learn library in Python to implement a meta-estimator which extends clustering.

meta.title: Inductive Clustering with Scikit-Learn
meta.description: Learn about inductive clustering, a method that extends clustering by inducing a classifier from the cluster labels, using Scikit-Learn in Python.
meta.keywords: machine learning, data clustering, python, scikit learn, inductive clustering
